TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpResponseWrapper extends System.Web.HttpResponseBase

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that provides HTTP-response information from an ASP.NET operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The HttpResponseWrapper class derives from the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseBase> class and serves as a wrapper for the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> class. This class exposes the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> class while also exposing the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseBase> type. The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseBase> class enables you to replace the original implementation of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void AddCacheDependency (System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency[] dependencies);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void AddCacheDependency(class System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency[] dependencies) cil managed

Docs.param: A file, cache key, or object to add to the list of application dependencies.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, associates cache dependencies with the response that enable the response to be invalidated if it is cached and if the specified dependencies change.

Docs.param: The virtual path of a resource.

Docs.returns: The virtual path with the session ID inserted. If session state is not used, returns the original value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Buffer property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper> class has been deprecated in favor of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponseWrapper.BufferOutput%2A> property and is provided only for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Expires { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Expires

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the number of minutes before a page that is cached on the client or proxy expires. If the user returns to the same page before it expires, the cached version is displayed. Expires is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
Docs.value: The number of minutes before the page expires.

MemberSignature.Value: public override DateTime ExpiresAbsolute { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.DateTime ExpiresAbsolute

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the absolute date and time at which cached information expires in the cache. ExpiresAbsolute is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
Docs.value: The date and time at which the page expires.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Status { get; set; }
.property instance string Status

Docs.summary: Sets the value that is returned to the client.
Docs.value: The status of the HTTP output. The default value is "200 (OK)". For information about valid status codes, see [HTTP Status Codes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73157) on the MSDN Web site.
Docs.exception: is set to an invalid status code.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int StatusCode { get; set; }
.property instance int32 StatusCode

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP status code of the output that is returned to the client.
Docs.value: The status code of the HTTP output that is returned to the client. The default value is 200. For information about valid status codes, see [HTTP Status Codes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73157) on the MSDN Web site.
Docs.exception: was set after the HTTP headers were sent.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string StatusDescription { get; set; }
.property instance string StatusDescription

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP status message of the output that is returned to the client.
Docs.value: The status message of the HTTP output that is returned to the client. The default value is "OK". For information about valid status codes, see [HTTP Status Codes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73157) on the MSDN Web site.
Docs.exception: was set after the HTTP headers were sent.
The status value is longer than 512 characters.

Docs.exception: The operation requires the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0.
The status code was set after all HTTP headers were sent.
